PC Process Guide

Omnichannel PC Process Guide

Your One-Stop Solution for All Process-Related Queries

Welcome to the comprehensive guide for Omnichannel PC processes.

This portal is designed to provide quick access to vital information for various regions.

Navigate through country-specific Process and troubleshooting tips with ease.

Select an option from the sidebar to begin! 🚀

🎯 SBD - DISPATCH CUT-OFF
2:00 PM IST
⚠️
CRITICAL CHECKLIST
🔍 Verify ENTITLEMENT & COUNTRY OF PURCHASE before dispatch ✅
🔋 Include Labor and Travel charges in quotes ⚡ Validate quote against myPRS Unit Price. If quote is > 80%, 🚫 do not send to CX. 🆘 Escalate to Leads immediately
⚡Conversations, Cases and Email Replies ⏰ Must be actioned same day 📧

Consumer Monitor As per Entitlement or within 2 years of Purchase only Infinet Process 3 - 4 BD WO ✓ ✓ ✓ ✗ Change Resource Name under WO Bookings to:
AUA-PR-CSR_Infinet 		icd@infinetgroup.com.au
service.au@infinetgroup.com.au & CC Leads		 Instructions:
Step-1: Open WO > Request Date and time next day 5:30 PM, SAVE.
Step-2:Within WO, open MO.
Step-3: Click on ATP and then save and close.
Step-4: Go back to WO and click on work order booking tab>> click on new bookable resource>> > New bookable window, Select duration 1 hour, resource name- aua-pr-csr.
Step-5: nd date- next day random time; start time should be 1 hour prior to end date, and SAVE (time will change) Change AM to PM for all three and Save and close.
Step-6:. Assign main case to mentor(Revathi).		 NA

• NO UID.
• Unit ouf of ACG.
• Hardware fault is confirmed		 NA
DOA - OOB or within 30 days of purchase First Option : Provide Service if customer refuses than Process for DOA Within 30 days from Purchase To be communicated by DOA team NA NA NA NA NA SPY_ES DOA apacsprdoa@hp.com TL Approval Mandate for all DOA cases
Claim Type:
• Replacement From HP-Purchased from HP OLS / Ingram
• Replacement from HP OLS- Purchased from HP OLS
• Replacement/Store Credit from Distributor-Purchased from Reseller and within 1 year only
• Replacement/Store Credit from Reseller-Purchased from Reseller and within 1 year only
• Beyond 12 months of purchase-Replacement from HP is only the option
• Refund only - Customer demanding REFUND: Elevate to Leads for SUPP call 		NA

CC mohammed.irfan2@hp.com and All leads		 NA
CLOSURE CODE
SCENARIO
Remote Solution
  • ✅ Includes: Driver and software updates, setting changes, hardware resets, firmware updates, and troubleshooting for system hangs, crashes, reboots, blue screens, performance issues, shutdowns, undetected devices, connectivity issues, bundled software, and product configurations.
  • 🔄 Confirmation Status: Solution may be confirmed or unconfirmed with the customer. If extensive troubleshooting was performed, assume potential resolution.
  • ⚠️ Closure as "Remote Solution": Close as "Remote Solution" if two issues are reported but only one is resolved.
  • 🛠️ Case Closure with Agreement: Potential resolution allows case closure if customer agrees, even if unconfirmed.
  • 🤝 Collaboration: HW, SW, or configuration issues resolved remotely with L2/L3 collaboration.
  • 📞 Non-Confirmed Resolution: If resolution provided initially but remains unconfirmed in follow-up, consider as non-confirmed resolution.
  • 🕒 HW Solution Testing Delay: HW solution offered but cannot be tested or implemented immediately by customer.
Non-Tech solution
  • 🛍️ Pre-Sales/Sales Queries: Address customer inquiries related to purchasing decisions. Follow Trade/HP Store processes if revenue opportunity exists.
  • 🔗 Hardware Compatibility: Provide information on product compatibility and Authorized Service Providers (location, contact details).
  • 📉 Product Limitations: Educate customers on HP product and software limitations or incompatibility.
  • 🛡️ Warranty Inquiries: Validate warranty status or handle requests for warranty extensions.
  • 🔒 Privacy/DSR Queries: Address requests involving HP Privacy Office for customer-initiated data privacy inquiries.
  • ❓ General Inquiries: Respond to "How do I?" questions.
  • 🔢 Part Number Information: Assist with part number inquiries for existing products if no revenue opportunity.
  • 📋 Extended Warranty/Carepack Sales: Offer warranty or Carepack sales for functioning units, both in and out of warranty.
  • 📖 Product Documentation/Manuals: Provide guidance on technical or usage documentation.
  • 📞 Customer Support Info: Share phone numbers, web-links, or drivers for information purposes.
  • 💼 Non-Technical Queries: Assist with general non-tech questions (e.g., billing methods, plan changes) even if the customer is unresponsive after information is provided.
Cancel per customer/No contact
  • 📝 Case Closure Request: Customer explicitly requests to cancel or close the case.
  • 🚶 Customer Disengages: Customer is no longer near the unit and chooses not to continue troubleshooting.
  • 🔧 Self-Resolution: Customer resolves the technical issue independently, without HP support.
  • ❌ Issue Not Replicated: Unable to replicate the reported issue during the support interaction.
  • 🛠️ Independent Troubleshooting: Customer or IT department decides to troubleshoot the issue on their own.
  • 🙅 Service Refusal: Customer declines the offer for service.
Unresolved – Does not agree to pay
  • 💸 In-Warranty, CID Declines Paid Support: In-warranty customer with CID is not interested in paid support options.
  • 📅 Request Outside Warranty/Contract: Customer requests service beyond warranty/contract terms but declines fee-based options (e.g., consulting, warranty uplift).
  • 🔧 OOW Complex SW Issue: OOW customer with a complex software issue needing 2LS support declines paid support.
  • 🚫 Fee-Based Support Cancellation: OOW customer cancels paid support after accepting the quotation at CC level.
  • 📉 Quotation Rejection: Trade/Quotation team records customer rejection of a quotation.
  • ❌ Fee for Service Declined: Frontline agent or ROPS team informs customer of service fees; customer either cancels service or is unresponsive after follow-up attempts.
Unresolved not entitled for support
  • 🕰️ End of Support Life (EOSL) Product: Support needed for an EOSL product, with the only solution being a new hardware purchase.
    Note: If resolved remotely on a best-effort basis, use the "Remote Solution" resolution code.
  • 🚫 Non-Compliance with Support Requirements: Customer does not meet necessary requirements to receive support.
  • 🌐 Out of Support Boundaries: Customer's request is beyond the standard support boundaries.
Referred for Hardware Service
  • 🔧 3rd Party HW Service Recommendation: Final resolution requires hardware service from a 3rd party vendor; agent advises customer to contact the specified vendor.
  • 🚪 Resolution Outside Customer Support: Responsibility for final resolution lies outside of Customer Support.
  • 🏬 Referral to HP Store/Internal Teams: Customer is directed to HP Store or internal teams with no case creation in CDAX.
Referred for Software Service
  • 💻 3rd Party SW Support Recommendation: Final resolution requires software support from a 3rd party vendor; agent advises customer to contact the specified vendor.
  • 🚪 Resolution Outside Customer Support: Responsibility for the resolution lies outside of Customer Support.
Cloud Recovery Download
  • ☁️ HP Cloud Recovery Request: Customer requests recovery media and opts to use HP Cloud Recovery.
    Note: Do not use for physical media orders.
  • 🛠️ No Technical Concern: Customer needs media but does not require any technical issue resolution.
  • ✅ Case Closure After Confirmation: Close the case only once the download is confirmed and the customer has no further concerns.
No Support Provided
  • 🔒 Mandatory Case Closure: Case must be stopped and closed due to a CDAX HP Security Verification alert or Global Trade Fail status.
  • 🚫 No-Go Decision: HP Security Verification HOLD alert or escalation required a Global Security decision; outcome was a no-go.
  • 📭 Customer Non-Response: HP Security Verification HOLD alert or escalation required customer input, but customer did not provide the necessary information within the agreed timeframe.
Case Voided
  • 🚫 Invalid/Spam Chat: Case can be voided if chat is invalid (e.g., spam, non-actionable scenarios, or created by mistake/automation).
  • 📞 Customer Requests Local Support: If customer insists on speaking with a local phone support technician mid-troubleshooting, case can be voided.
  • 🔌 Customer Disconnected Early: If customer disconnects after initial probing or during troubleshooting, agent follows snooze process. If customer remains disconnected, case can be closed as "Case Voided."
  • 🚶 Customer Unable to Complete Troubleshooting: If customer leaves the unit during troubleshooting, agent uses the snooze process. Case can be voided if customer is fully disconnected or postpones response for 2+ days.
  • ⏳ No Response After Snoozing: If customer does not respond after snoozing (including WhatsApp lock or MTM non-responsiveness), case can be voided.
  • ❗ Case Creation Error: If case was created by mistake, agent should document the reason in the case note before voiding.
  • 🔄 Duplicate Case: Case can be voided if another open case exists for the same issue or unit. Agent should combine and document both issues under one case as necessary.
  • 🛡️ Ineligibility for Support: If Global Brand Security Team confirms customer is ineligible for support (with no prior alert), agent should attach the confirmation email to the case and close as "Case Voided."
Service Solutions
  • 🏢 Offsite Solution: Resolution requires customer to send the product to an offsite location for service.
  • 🏠 Onsite Solution: Support is provided at the customer's location with a technician visit.
  • 📦 Parts Shipped: Required parts are shipped directly to the customer for self-installation or technician-assisted installation.
